content: I would say, the real advantage for the segment and this is something that we highlight a lot is, we may not be diving into the Single-Family Rental market, if we were going out buying the score at fair market value, itâs probably not the highest value thing that we think weâre good at doing is to define where these market home, where the homes would be in the highest market potential for that, but because weâre adding value to the community, because weâre adding value to each of our individual lots, thatâs where we think that this is so compelling for our shareholders is that it not only increases the value of the asset class, these homes are appreciating at 5%, 6%, 7% and in Sky Ranchâs example, because we started the community, youâve seen as much as a 40% increase in value of the homes from our Phase 1.
